dct_title_s: Net-Zero America land-use exclusions for solar projects under net-zero scenarios (base land use), 2050
dct_description_sm: This dataset shows land excluded from the siting of solar photovoltaic candidate project areas (CPAs) in the contiguous United States to 2050 under all net-zero-emissions scenarios with more permissive land-use assumptions. Exclusions based on considerations of techno-economic factors, environment and conservation, prime soils, and slope are shown separately. For an overview of the "base" land-use assumptions on which this dataset is predicated, please refer to the "supplemental information" portion of this record.
dct_creator_sm: Andrew Pascale, Andlinger Center, Princeton University, Post-Doctoral Research Associate
Emily Leslie, Energy Reflections, LLC, Principal
Jesse Jenkins, Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering Department and Andlinger Center, Princeton University, Assistant Professor
